modal_sobre_noxbyte_texto1: We are NoxByte, a software development company formed by students from the Technological Institute of Informatics (ITI): Fabricio Figueroa, Bruno Mendez, Georgina Madera, and Giuliana Arregui.
modal_sobre_noxbyte_texto2: Our mission is to apply our knowledge of computer science to develop creative and functional projects through teamwork, continuous learning, and tackling every challenge presented to us, just as the Institute taught us.
modal_sobre_noxbyte_texto3: This "Draftosaurus" project reflects our commitment to computer science and entertainment, providing a visually appealing strategy project for players like you.
modal_sobre_noxbyte_gracias: Thank you for exploring our work. We hope you enjoy the application!
modal_confirmar_reinicio_texto: Are you sure you want to restart the game? All current progress will be lost.
index_jugar_subtitulo: Show you're the best Jurassic strategist and play our digital version of Draftosaurus!
index_registrar_subtitulo: Enter the details of your physical game with the tracking app to keep a complete record.
index_partidas_vacias: You currently have no games in progress.
index_como_jugar_texto: Draftosaurus is a board game where players must create the best possible Jurassic park. Each player selects dinosaurs and strategically places them in their park to maximize their score.
login_crear_cuenta_subtitulo: Join the adventure to save your progress!
auth_usuario_o_email_existen: Username or email already in use.
auth_registro_exitoso: Registration successful, {nombreUsuario}! You can now log in.
error_acceso_denegado_sesion: Access denied. You must be logged in.
notif_edad_negativa: Age cannot be a negative number.
notif_contrasena_corta: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
notif_error_conexion: A connection error occurred. Please try again.
notif_ingresa_usuario_contrasena: Please enter your username and password.
tutorial_bienvenida_texto: Is it your first day? Don't worry, this will help you become an expert!
tutorial_final_texto: You have learned the basics to manage your park. Welcome to Draftosaurus!
tutorial_paso_inicio_mano_texto: In each round, you must draw 6 dinosaurs from the bag. This is done automatically!
tutorial_paso_mano_lista: Great! These 6 dinosaurs are now in your hand. Your goal is to choose one and place it in a pen in the park.
tutorial_paso_recinto_bosque: The "Forest of Sameness". Here, all dinos must be of the same species. Drag or click on the parasaurolophus and then on the pen.
tutorial_paso_recinto_rey: The "King of the Jungle" gives you 7 points if you have more dinos of the species you place than your rivals. Drag or click on the triceratops and then on the pen.
tutorial_paso_recinto_trio: The "Leafy Trio". You earn 7 points if you place exactly 3 dinos. Drag or click on the t-rex and then on the pen.
tutorial_paso_recinto_prado: This is the "Meadow of Difference". Here you can only place different species. Drag or click on the brachiosaurus and then on the pen.
tutorial_paso_recinto_amor: The "Prairie of Love", you get 5 points for pairs of dinosaurs of the same species. Drag or click on the spinosaurus and then on the pen.
tutorial_paso_recinto_isla: The "Solitary Island" gives points if the dino is the only one of its species in your entire park. Drag or click on the stegosaurus and then on the pen.
tutorial_paso_dado_intro: Now we will explain the die. At the beginning of each turn, a player rolls it, this player is called the "Active Player". The face that lands up creates a restriction for the other players, but does not affect the active player.
tutorial_paso_dado_boscosa: This face is "Forested Zone". It forces you to place in one of the 3 forest pens on the board.
tutorial_paso_dado_banos: This is the "Restroom Zone". It forces you to place in one of the 3 pens on the right side of the board.
tutorial_paso_dado_llanura: This face is "Plains Zone". It forces you to place in the 3 pens located in the Plains Zone.
tutorial_paso_dado_cafeteria: This is the "Cafeteria Zone". It forces you to place in one of the 3 pens on the left side of the board.
tutorial_paso_dado_vacio: This face is "Empty Pen" and it forces you to place your dinosaur in a pen that is completely empty in your park.
tutorial_paso_dado_sin_trex: And finally, this face prohibits placing your dinosaur in a pen where you have already placed a T-Rex.
notif_tutorial_dino_incorrecto: That's not the right dinosaur for this step!
ajustes_modal_nombre_subtitulo: You can change your username once every 30 days.
ajustes_modal_contrasena_subtitulo: Use a strong password to protect your account.
ajustes_modal_eliminar_texto: Are you sure? This action is not reversible. Your account and all your data will be permanently deleted.
ajustes_error_espera_nombre: You can change your name again in {dias} days.
ajustes_error_nombre_en_uso: That username is already in use. Please choose another.
ajustes_cuenta_eliminada_exito: Your account has been permanently deleted.
ajustes_error_eliminar_cuenta: An error occurred while trying to delete your account.
historial_subtitulo: Here you can see all your finished digital mode games that you have saved.
historial_vacio: You don't have any games saved in your history yet.
historial_error_carga: Connection error. Could not load history.
historial_modal_eliminar_texto: Are you sure you want to delete this game from your history? This action cannot be undone.
historial_eliminada_exito: The game history entry has been deleted.
historial_error_eliminar: Could not delete the game from history.
historial_error_no_encontrada: The game history entry was not found or does not belong to you.
historial_error_no_encontrada_o_permiso: Could not delete the game. It might no longer exist or you don't have permission.
notif_historial_error_conexion_cargar: Connection error when loading the game.
notif_historial_error_conexion_eliminar: Connection error when deleting the game.
historial_guardado_exito: Game saved to your history successfully!
admin_menu_subtitulo: Select an option to manage the system.
admin_usuarios_subtitulo: Manage registered users in the system.
admin_modal_confirmar_eliminacion_texto: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the user "{nombreUsuario}"? This action cannot be undone.
config_seguimiento_bienvenida_texto: Welcome to Tracking Mode! This mode allows you to keep a detailed record of your Draftosaurus games, place dinosaurs, and calculate the final scores.
config_digital_bienvenida_texto: Welcome to Digital Mode! Play a full game of Draftosaurus directly on your device. Invite your friends and let the adventure begin!
notif_debes_estar_logueado: You must be logged in to Play
tablero_restriccion_subtitulo: (Applies to everyone EXCEPT the Active Player)
tablero_tu_mano_subtitulo: Select a dinosaur and then click on a valid pen to place it.
tablero_modal_mano_subtitulo: Select 6 dinosaurs for the player's hand.
notif_no_jugadores: No players found. Please set up a game first.
notif_todos_jugaron: Not all players have played yet.
notif_ya_jugaste: You have already placed a dinosaur this turn.
notif_no_en_mano: The dinosaur is not in the player's hand.
notif_mano_llena: You can only have 6 dinos in your hand!
digital_modal_guardar_texto: Give your finished game a name to save it in your history and view it whenever you want.
notif_digital_error_reanudar: Could not resume game. Starting a new one.
notif_digital_jugador_no_activo: You are not the active player. {nombreJugadorActivo} must roll the die!
notif_digital_debes_lanzar: You are the active player. You must roll the die before placing a tile!
notif_digital_fin_ronda: End of Round {rondaActual}. Dealing new dinos!
partida_error_guardar_db: Database error when trying to save the game.
partida_error_no_encontrada: Game not found or does not belong to you.
partida_error_no_encontrada_o_permiso: Could not delete the game. It might already be deleted or does not belong to you.
partida_error_datos_incompletos_finaliza: Incomplete data to save the finished game.
partida_error_nombre_vacio_finalizada: The game name cannot be empty.
partida_error_guardar_historial_db: Database error when saving to history.
modal_confirmar_eliminacion_partida_text: Are you sure you want to delete this saved game? This action cannot be undone.
ajustes_modal_idioma_subtitulo: Choose the language you prefer for the application.
ajustes_idioma_actualizado_exito: Preferred language updated. The page will reload.
